parameters.query:
INSERT INTO purchase_requests (
  request_id, requester_name, requester_department, requester_email,
  total_amount, currency, supplier_name, supplier_code,
  status, requested_date, delivery_date
) VALUES (
  '{{ $json.purchase_request_id }}',
  '{{ $json.requester.name }}',
  '{{ $json.requester.department }}',
  '{{ $json.requester.email }}',
  {{ $json.total_amount }},
  '{{ $json.currency || "USD" }}',
  '{{ $json.supplier.name }}',
  '{{ $json.supplier.code }}',
  'pending',
  '{{ $json.requested_date }}',
  '{{ $json.delivery_date }}'
) RETURNING *;
